about_the_game:
Your support empowers us to continue creating captivating stories, unique characters, and immersive worlds. Thank you for being a vital part of our community!

WHAT YOU'RE GETTING


  • 500 Nanites - useful for speeding up your progress.
  • 25 eLDi - keeping your girls alive during missions.
  • 7 days of VIP Account - boosting your experience for the first week.
  • Mystery Champion Legendary Gacha - enabling You to meet a new powerful girl.
  • Legendary equipment set on level 10 - to give this new champion something to wear during upcoming battles.

And of course, by purchasing this DLC, you are supporting us. Thank you!

This DLC is non-refundable after activation.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game contains content not appropriate for all ages, and is not appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content, some references to Substance/Alcohol Abuse.

All characters depicted are over the age of 18.

Mature content in this game includes:
- Blowjobs, Handjobs, and Sex
- Polyamory, Group Sex and Orgies
- Lesbian Sex
- Android Sex
- Consensual BDSM and bondage
- Punishment and instances of non-consensual sexual activities

name: Shelter 69 - Legendary Starter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play.
